Class FtsQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteQueryBuilder
      • au.com.cybersearch2.classyfts.FtsQueryBuilder

  • public class FtsQueryBuilder
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteQueryBuilder
    QueryBuilder Fast text search query builder
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 02/09/2014

      • FtsQueryBuilder

        public FtsQueryBuilder(int queryType,
               android.net.Uri uri,
               String[] projection,
               String selection,
               String[] selectionArgs,
               String sortOrder)
        Create an FtsQueryBuilder object
        Parameters:
        queryType - UriMatcher type
        uri - Query URI received by Content Resolver
        projection - A list of which columns to return
        selection - A filter declaring which rows to return
        selectionArgs - Selection arguments for "?" components in the selection
        sortOrder - How to order the rows

      • setSortOrder

        public void setSortOrder(String sortOrder)
        Set How to order the rows
        Parameters:
        sortOrder - String formatted as an SQL ORDER BY clause (excluding the ORDER BY itself). The default is to use the default sort order, which may be unordered.
